scripts.postinstall:
echo 'Populating Database with:
==============
user: Admin 
pass:123456789
==============
Please change this password immediately.'; mongo developer_scripts/populate_db.js
scripts.resetdb: mongo developer_scripts/clean_db.js; mongo developer_scripts/populate_db.js; echo 'DB wiped and repopulated with default admin user. user: Admin. pass: 123456789'
scripts.devreset: mongo developer_scripts/clean_db.js; mongo developer_scripts/populate_db.js; echo 'DB wiped and repopulated with default admin user. user: Admin. pass: 123456789'; node app.js
